trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class encapsulates the transport security settings for queued transports.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class, using an existing instance.
The existing instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class, to be used in initializing the new instance.
other is `null`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
MSMQ can authenticate messages that are sent to message queues that require authentication, or messages can explicitly request authentication.
The default authentication mode is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode.WindowsDomain>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
The value is not one of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
MSMQ can encrypt messages on the wire when transferring messages between message queue managers.
The default encryption algorithm is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm.RC4Stream>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
The value is not one of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
The default protection level is <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel.Sign>.
The <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
The value is not one of the <xref href="System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
The default hash algorithm is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm.SHA1>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm"></xref> that is associated with this instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
The value is not one of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm"></xref> values.
